name: Kidus - Play, Learn, and Grow
description: Welcome to the world of Kidus, which is full of memorable characters like Rohit, Avani, Raagi, Tanya, Chintu, Ms Ruby, Liza, and many more. Here, learning is fun. You will make some good friends here. You will not only get fun here but also you will enjoy your study here. You can get familiar with every character. Avani and Raagi will be your friends. You will play as well as learn with them. As you will start the game you will find Chintu and Avani are brother and sister while Raagi is Avani's friend. Ms Ruby is a strict teacher who punishes dull students. Raagi is afraid of with her. You can help Raagi by answering her questions. But before doing that you will have to study well to know the correct answer.
